parameters.name: protect

param_schema.title: Protect
param_schema.description: Control how much of the original vocals' breath and voiceless consonants to leave in the AI vocals. Set 0.5 to disable.

parameters.description: Control how much of the original vocals' breath and voiceless consonants to leave in the AI vocals. Set 0.5 to disable.

parameters.name: rvc_model

param_schema.description: RVC model for a specific voice. If using a custom model, this should match the name of the downloaded model. If a 'custom_rvc_model_download_url' is provided, this will be automatically set to the name of the downloaded model.

parameters.description: RVC model for a specific voice. If using a custom model, this should match the name of the downloaded model. If a 'custom_rvc_model_download_url' is provided, this will be automatically set to the name of the downloaded model.

parameters.name: index_rate

param_schema.title: Index Rate
param_schema.description: Control how much of the AI's accent to leave in the vocals.

parameters.description: Control how much of the AI's accent to leave in the vocals.

parameters.name: reverb_size

param_schema.title: Reverb Size
param_schema.description: The larger the room, the longer the reverb time.

parameters.description: The larger the room, the longer the reverb time.

parameters.name: pitch_change

param_schema.description: Adjust pitch of AI vocals. Options: `no-change`, `male-to-female`, `female-to-male`.

parameters.description: Adjust pitch of AI vocals. Options: `no-change`, `male-to-female`, `female-to-male`.

parameters.name: rms_mix_rate

param_schema.title: Rms Mix Rate
param_schema.description: Control how much to use the original vocal's loudness (0) or a fixed loudness (1).

parameters.description: Control how much to use the original vocal's loudness (0) or a fixed loudness (1).

parameters.name: filter_radius

param_schema.title: Filter Radius
param_schema.description: If >=3: apply median filtering median filtering to the harvested pitch results.

parameters.description: If >=3: apply median filtering median filtering to the harvested pitch results.

parameters.name: output_format

param_schema.description: wav for best quality and large file size, mp3 for decent quality and small file size.

parameters.description: wav for best quality and large file size, mp3 for decent quality and small file size.

parameters.name: reverb_damping

param_schema.title: Reverb Damping
param_schema.description: Absorption of high frequencies in the reverb.

parameters.description: Absorption of high frequencies in the reverb.

parameters.name: reverb_dryness

param_schema.title: Reverb Dryness
param_schema.description: Level of AI vocals without reverb.

parameters.description: Level of AI vocals without reverb.

parameters.name: reverb_wetness

param_schema.title: Reverb Wetness
param_schema.description: Level of AI vocals with reverb.

parameters.description: Level of AI vocals with reverb.

parameters.name: crepe_hop_length

param_schema.title: Crepe Hop Length
param_schema.description: When `pitch_detection_algo` is set to `mangio-crepe`, this controls how often it checks for pitch changes in milliseconds. Lower values lead to longer conversions and higher risk of voice cracks, but better pitch accuracy.

parameters.description: When `pitch_detection_algo` is set to `mangio-crepe`, this controls how often it checks for pitch changes in milliseconds. Lower values lead to longer conversions and higher risk of voice cracks, but better pitch accuracy.

parameters.name: pitch_change_all

param_schema.title: Pitch Change All
param_schema.description: Change pitch/key of background music, backup vocals and AI vocals in semitones. Reduces sound quality slightly.

parameters.description: Change pitch/key of background music, backup vocals and AI vocals in semitones. Reduces sound quality slightly.

parameters.name: main_vocals_volume_change

param_schema.title: Main Vocals Volume Change
param_schema.description: Control volume of main AI vocals. Use -3 to decrease the volume by 3 decibels, or 3 to increase the volume by 3 decibels.

parameters.description: Control volume of main AI vocals. Use -3 to decrease the volume by 3 decibels, or 3 to increase the volume by 3 decibels.

parameters.name: pitch_detection_algorithm

param_schema.description: Best option is rmvpe (clarity in vocals), then mangio-crepe (smoother vocals).

parameters.description: Best option is rmvpe (clarity in vocals), then mangio-crepe (smoother vocals).

parameters.name: instrumental_volume_change

param_schema.title: Instrumental Volume Change
param_schema.description: Control volume of the background music/instrumentals.

parameters.description: Control volume of the background music/instrumentals.

parameters.name: backup_vocals_volume_change

param_schema.title: Backup Vocals Volume Change
param_schema.description: Control volume of backup AI vocals.

parameters.description: Control volume of backup AI vocals.

parameters.name: custom_rvc_model_download_url

param_schema.title: Custom Rvc Model Download Url
param_schema.description: URL to download a custom RVC model. If provided, the model will be downloaded (if it doesn't already exist) and used for prediction, regardless of the 'rvc_model' value.

parameters.description: URL to download a custom RVC model. If provided, the model will be downloaded (if it doesn't already exist) and used for prediction, regardless of the 'rvc_model' value.

protect.title: Protect
protect.description: Control how much of the original vocals' breath and voiceless consonants to leave in the AI vocals. Set 0.5 to disable.

rvc_model.description: RVC model for a specific voice. If using a custom model, this should match the name of the downloaded model. If a 'custom_rvc_model_download_url' is provided, this will be automatically set to the name of the downloaded model.

index_rate.title: Index Rate
index_rate.description: Control how much of the AI's accent to leave in the vocals.

reverb_size.title: Reverb Size
reverb_size.description: The larger the room, the longer the reverb time.

pitch_change.description: Adjust pitch of AI vocals. Options: `no-change`, `male-to-female`, `female-to-male`.

rms_mix_rate.title: Rms Mix Rate
rms_mix_rate.description: Control how much to use the original vocal's loudness (0) or a fixed loudness (1).

filter_radius.title: Filter Radius
filter_radius.description: If >=3: apply median filtering median filtering to the harvested pitch results.

output_format.description: wav for best quality and large file size, mp3 for decent quality and small file size.

reverb_damping.title: Reverb Damping
reverb_damping.description: Absorption of high frequencies in the reverb.

reverb_dryness.title: Reverb Dryness
reverb_dryness.description: Level of AI vocals without reverb.

reverb_wetness.title: Reverb Wetness
reverb_wetness.description: Level of AI vocals with reverb.

crepe_hop_length.title: Crepe Hop Length
crepe_hop_length.description: When `pitch_detection_algo` is set to `mangio-crepe`, this controls how often it checks for pitch changes in milliseconds. Lower values lead to longer conversions and higher risk of voice cracks, but better pitch accuracy.

pitch_change_all.title: Pitch Change All
pitch_change_all.description: Change pitch/key of background music, backup vocals and AI vocals in semitones. Reduces sound quality slightly.

main_vocals_volume_change.title: Main Vocals Volume Change
main_vocals_volume_change.description: Control volume of main AI vocals. Use -3 to decrease the volume by 3 decibels, or 3 to increase the volume by 3 decibels.

pitch_detection_algorithm.description: Best option is rmvpe (clarity in vocals), then mangio-crepe (smoother vocals).

instrumental_volume_change.title: Instrumental Volume Change
instrumental_volume_change.description: Control volume of the background music/instrumentals.

backup_vocals_volume_change.title: Backup Vocals Volume Change
backup_vocals_volume_change.description: Control volume of backup AI vocals.

custom_rvc_model_download_url.title: Custom Rvc Model Download Url
custom_rvc_model_download_url.description: URL to download a custom RVC model. If provided, the model will be downloaded (if it doesn't already exist) and used for prediction, regardless of the 'rvc_model' value.
